# Release <!-- `v0.0.0` -->

### Checklist

- [ ] `NEWS` is up-to-date
- [ ] Bump `DESCRIPTION` version
- [ ] Create merge request with changes
- [ ] Publish to CRAN
- [ ] Merge changes
- [ ] Tag release commit with version number (`v0.0.0`)
- [ ] GitHub release
- [ ] Introduce commit to add dev version number
